page.title: 07A CHOSEN N.CAVE,HOTHAM WALK
page.content: My favourite walk is a circular walk round Hotham. I live in North Cave, but Hotham is a smaller, quieter and, in my opinion, more attractive village. I walk along a windy road (895329 public footpath) with an abundance of flowers and a lot of fields. That's why I like walking this route in summer because the fields are golden and the flowers are open and the trees in full leaf. I really enjoy this part of the walk. We stroll into the main village and turn right through the gate, past Hotham Hall by the woods and past baa-ing sheep over the cattle grid. Turn right to Nordham and our house. I recommend this walk because it's quiet, attractive and very enjoyable.
